scripts.generate-types: yarn rust-schema && tsc --project codegen-tsconfig.json && rm -rf types/generated && node build/codegen && node build/codegen/insertIgnores.js && yarn format
scripts.rust-schema: cd ../ && cargo make generate-all-schemas && cd scripts
scripts.compile-wasm: cd ../ && cargo make rust-optimizer && cd scripts
scripts.compile-health-web: yarn run compile-health-base --target web --out-dir ../../scripts/health/pkg-web --features javascript && rm health/pkg-web/.gitignore
scripts.compile-health-node: yarn run compile-health-base --target nodejs --out-dir ../../scripts/health/pkg-node --features javascript && rm health/pkg-node/.gitignore
scripts.compile-health-all: yarn compile-health-node && yarn compile-health-web && yarn format
